Rautoml 1.0.0.0
  • Reference

    Table Summary Function

    custom_crosstab.Rd

    This function generates a table summary using the gtsummary package.

    custom_crosstab(
  df,
  vars,
  by = NULL,
  strata = NULL,
  add.p = TRUE,
  add.ci = FALSE,
  report_numeric = c("mean", "median"),
  numeric_summary = c("sd", "min-max"),
  drop_na = FALSE,
  caption = NULL
)

    Arguments

    df

    A data frame containing the data.

    vars

    Character vector of variables to summarize.

    by

    Optional. A categorical variable to group by.

    strata

    Optional. A categorical variable for stratification.

    add.p

    Logical. If TRUE (default), adds p-values.

    add.ci

    Logical. If TRUE, adds confidence intervals.

    report_numeric

    Character. Method to report numeric data ("mean" or "median").

    numeric_summary

    Character. Summary method for numeric data ("sd" or "min-max").

    drop_na

    Logical. If TRUE, drops NA values.

    caption

    Optional. Table caption.

    Value

    A gtsummary table object.

    Examples

    df <- data.frame(Group = rep(c("A", "B"), each = 50), Value = rnorm(100))
tablefun(df, vars = "Value", by = "Group")
#> Error in tablefun(df, vars = "Value", by = "Group"): could not find function "tablefun"
